entry.title: Divine - Facial Tissues 2 Ply x 100 Sheets - 30/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Divine
Type: Disposables
Price: 23.99

Divine - Facial Tissues 2 Ply x 100 Sheets - 30/Case

These Divine 2-ply tissues strike the perfect balance between value and comfort, delivering a better overall experience for your valued guests without breaking the bank. Perfect for offices and the hospitality industry, these tissues help prevent the spread of germs to promote a sanitary environment. Add these gentle 2-ply tissues to your business for convenience and quality!

Easy Dispensing

These interlocked tissues ensure one-at-a-time dispensing and minimized waste.

Compact Design

Thanks to its compact size, this tissue box fits on your restroom's countertop, bedside night stand, front desk, and more.

  • Gentle 2-ply material
  • Compact size for convenient positioning
  • Perforated top ensures tissues remain protected until use
  • Releases one tissue at a time for minimized waste
  • Great for offices, restaurants, hotels, and more
  • 8.1"x7.3"
  • velvety soft
  • our highest quality and softness facial tissue

entry.title: Cascades Pro - K250 - 2 Ply Wrapped Kitchen Towel Roll 11" x 8" - 12 x 250 Sheets/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 37.99

Cascades PRO Select® kitchen roll towels are the economical and environmentally responsible choice for foodservice and schools.

Cascades PRO Select® jumbo 2-ply kitchen roll towels have more sheets per roll, helping to avoid run-outs and great for cleaning up big messes. Made from 100% recycled fiber and a minimum of 50% post-consumer fiber, these towels will turn anyone into a green, mean, cleaning machine. Towels are Green Seal certified and exceed EPA comprehensive procurement guidelines. Ideal for cleaning and wiping down surfaces in food service establishments, kitchens, classrooms and cafeterias.

This product meets the Green Seal® Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material.

Cascades Pro - K250 - 2 Ply Individually Wrapped Kitchen Towel Roll, 250 Sheets, 11" x 8" - 12/Case

entry.title: Cascades Pro Select - H045 - Kraft Hand Paper Towel Roll 8" x 425' - 12/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Absorb spills and dry freshly-cleaned hands with these Janitorial natural brown paper towels.

With a hardwound roll and non-perforated design, Janitorial paper towels allow users to easily tear off exactly how much they need, effectively minimizing waste and boosting your bottom line! Made of eco-friendly kraft paper, these strong paper towels are guaranteed to do the trick in any bathroom, handwashing station, or spill station and at a price that won't break your budget.

Cascades PRO Select® natural roll paper towels have 12 rolls per case and 60 cases per pallet. With 7.9'' x 350 feet per roll, 1.9'' core diameter and 5.3'' roll diameter, this roll towel is absorbent, functional and reliable. This roll paper towel is an economical choice and is perfect for the everyday needs.

Cascades PRO Select® 350 feet roll paper towels may be small, but they are absorbent and are made from 100% recycled fiber, offering environmental benefits. This roll paper towel combines value and affordability for restrooms, breakrooms and kitchens for places across the education, industrial, foodservice and retail markets.

 

Long-Lasting and Eco-Friendly

Boasting an impressive length that reduces the need to constantly restock paper towels, these towels are an excellent economical choice for high volume venues! And because they are made of 100% recycled fibers with a minimum of 45% post-consumer content, these towels get the job done while minimizing your ecological footprint.

Non-Perforated

The towel's non-perforated design helps minimize waste and save you money by letting guests tear off what they need instead of a predetermined length that may be too much.

2" Core

Thanks to a 2" universal core, this hardwound roll of towels can conveniently be used in the vast majority of dispensers.

Textured

The towels feature an embossed texture that helps you efficiently wipe off countertops, clean up messes, and dry hands

entry.title: Cascades Pro Select - H110 - White Singlefold Paper Towel - 4000 Sheets/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

For an absorbent, economical paper towel, choose this Janitorial white Single-fold towel.

Supply your restaurant, hotel, or cafe with this absorbent, 1-ply single-fold paper towel! Even before use, the convenient inner packaging allows for easy, space saving storage. With this practical towel, your guests and staff will be able to quickly and efficiently dry their hands with ease. Plus, the durable material can be used for spills when needed for multi-purpose use!

Cascades PRO Select® singlefold paper towel, made with 100% recycled material, keeps hands dry while reducing waste in restrooms, breakrooms and cafeterias.

The one at a time dispensing of Cascades PRO Select® singlefold paper towels, help to reduce waste, while its 100% recycled fiber make it the sustainable choice at an economic price. Each absorbent towel will keep your hands dry after every use. Optimal for use across a wide range of markets such: education, industrial, foodservice, and retail.

Folded Design

Boasting a smart, single-fold design, this towel is great for reducing excess consumption since it allows just one towel to be dispensed at a time. In addition, this paper towel conveniently fits in C-fold and M-fold towel dispensers for versatile use.

Easily Dispensed

This paper towel allows for easy placement into dispensers, so your staff can quickly refill them as needed.

Versatile Use

This white paper towel can be used in various locations such as your establishment's restroom for guests or in the kitchen for your employees.

Eco-Friendly

Made out of 100% recycled fiber, this towel is great for any eco-friendly business. 

Cascades Pro Select - H110 White Singlefold Towel - 4000 Sheets/Case

Cascades PRO® universal lever roll towel dispenser delivers the best value in roll towel dispensers, with benefits that speak for themselves.

This reliable dispenser delivers value and performance in a compact design. Its space saving layout is perfect for cafeterias or locker rooms with limited space. entry.title: Cascades Pro - DH39 Multifold/C-Fold Hand Towel Dispenser - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 41.99

Cascades PRO® universal multifold/c-fold hand towel dispensers are durable, reliable, and ideal alternatives to larger, conventional folded towel dispensers for tight spaces such as restrooms, classrooms and cafeterias.

The Cascades PRO® universal multifold hand towel dispenser is smaller than conventional folded towel dispensers and thus ideal for tight spaces. This dispenser is durable, reliable and easy to use, with fewer moving parts and the ability to hold more than 500 multifold paper towels in your restrooms, classrooms, staff rooms, cafeterias, kitchens, and more.

entry.title: Frost - 105 Multifold Towel Sheets Metal Dispenser - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frost
Type: Disposables
Price: 53.99

Site Location: The compact size and variety of finishes makes the 105 and 107 ideal for use in any room or site location.

Features: Towel opening has rolled safety edge (black finish on all units).  All units come with keyed tumbler lock to reduce pilferage and vandalism.  Front loading for easy service and maintenance.  Product shipped with protective plastic coating to be removed after installation.

Materials: One piece coverall door.  22 gauge steel construction with a white powder coat finish.

Dispensing: The paper towel dispenser opening will dispense multifold and “C” fold towels. The product will easily hold a standard package of multifold or “C” fold towels, which is approximately 250 towels. There is additional room for more towels to be added if desired.

Weight: 2 kg. (4.5 lbs.)

Dimensions: 11″L x “13.5”W x 4.1″D

Installation: For unrestricted access, bottom of unit to floor must not exceed 48″ (120).

Maintenance: Normal preventative maintenance and cleaning will keep Frost products functioning properly and may extend normal product life. Products should be wiped down with a damp soft cloth periodically. Approved stainless steel cleaner may be used to clean scuffs or fingerprints on stainless surfaces. Do not use harsh detergents or chemical cleaners.

Warranty: Frost Products Ltd warrants that if any Frost product or Frost product part proves to be defective within 12 months from the date of shipment from the factory it will be repaired or replaced without any charge when authorized. Frost warranty does not cover damaged product due to neglect or mishandling. Frost warranty does not cover installation or removal costs.  Discolouration to stainless steel parts resulting from exposure to harsh environmental and / or chemicals are not considered to be defects in workmanship or material and are not covered under warranty.

entry.title: Frost -101J Jumbo Roll Towel Metal Dispenser 205'- 600' Roll - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frost
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

Site location: The 101 series of dispensers are an industry standard and can be used in any room or site location. The 101-J offers maximum towel capacity in a compact unit.

Features:  Front loading for easy service and maintenance.  All doors are hinged with full length stainless steel piano hinges.  Product shipped with protective plastic coating to be removed after installation.  Available with keyed tumbler lock to reduce pilferage and vandalism.

Materials:  All welded construction of 20 and 22 gauge steel with white epoxy finish.

Dispensing: Universal paper towel dispenser will accept all standard roll towels (max. 7-1/4″ diameter and up to 10″ long). This includes almost all 425 ft. jumbo rolls and the Scott 500 ft. rolls.

Loading Instructions:  Place standard roll towels inside the body of the unit.  Pull loose end through the feeder.  Leave some paper towel exposed so users can pull and tear their desired amount.

Weight: 2.7 kg. (6 lbs.)

Dimensions: 10.5″L x 9.5″W x 7.25″D

Installation: For unrestricted access bottom of unit to floor must not exceed 44″ (111.7).

Maintenance: Normal preventative maintenance and cleaning will keep Frost products functioning properly and may extend normal product life. Products should be wiped down with a damp soft cloth periodically. Approved stainless steel cleaner may be used to clean scuffs or fingerprints on stainless surfaces. Do not use harsh detergents or chemical cleaners.

Warranty: Frost Products Ltd warrants that if any Frost product or Frost product part proves to be defective within 12 months from the date of shipment from the factory it will be repaired or replaced without any charge when authorized. Frost warranty does not cover damaged product due to neglect or mishandling. Frost warranty does not cover installation or removal costs.  Discolouration to stainless steel parts resulting from exposure to harsh environmental and / or chemicals are not considered to be defects in workmanship or material and are not covered under warranty.

entry.title: Frost - 101 Hand Towel Metal Dispenser for Single Fold & 205'- 405' Roll - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frost
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Site Location: The 101 series of dispensers are an industry standard and can be used in any room or site location.

Features: Front loading for easy service and maintenance.  All doors are hinged with full length stainless steel piano hinges.  Product shipped with protective plastic coating to be removed after installation.  Available with keyed tumbler lock to reduce pilferage on product code 101-1.

entry.title: Frost - 126 Chrome Kitchen Towel Dispenser 11"- Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frost
Type: Disposables
Price: 27.99

Site location: Ideal for medical offices first aid and lunch rooms.

Features: Tension springs restrict paper consumption.  Pivot arm hinged on hardened steel rivets.  Concealed locking device prevents pilferage and vandalism.

Materials: All welded construction 18 gauge steel with polished chrome finish.

Dispensing: Designed to dispense standard regular size 11″ length x 6″ diameter rolls.

Weight: 1.25 lbs. (0.57 kg)

Dimensions: 2.686″H x 12.5″W x 4.375″D

Installation: Position bottom of fixture 48″ 122 cm from floor. Secure to wall through mounting holes using screws provided.

Maintenance: Normal preventative maintenance and cleaning will keep Frost products functioning properly and may extend normal product life. Products should be wiped down with a damp soft cloth periodically. Approved stainless steel cleaner may be used to clean scuffs or fingerprints on stainless surfaces. Made of eco-friendly kraft paper, these strong paper towels are guaranteed to do the trick in any bathroom, handwashing station, or spill station and at a price that won't break your budget.

Long-Lasting and Eco-Friendly

Boasting an impressive 425' length that reduces the need to constantly restock paper towels, these towels are an excellent economical choice for high volume venues! And because they are made of 100% recycled fibers with a minimum of 45% post-consumer content, these towels get the job done while minimizing your ecological footprint.

Non-Perforated

The towel's non-perforated design helps minimize waste and save you money by letting guests tear off what they need instead of a predetermined length that may be too much.

2" Core

Thanks to a 2" universal core, this hardwound roll of towels can conveniently be used in the vast majority of dispensers.

Textured

The towels feature an embossed texture that helps you efficiently wipe off countertops, clean up messes, and dry hands
